item.title: 澳大利亚财富基金警告通胀将持续走高
item.description: 随着全球不确定性扰乱市场，贸易紧张局势一触即发，澳大利亚主权财富基金正准备在 "较长一段时间内 "提高通胀率和债券收益率。【原文：Australia’s sovereign wealth fund is preparing for higher inflation and bond yields for “an extended period” as global uncertainty upends markets and trade tensions simmer.】

item.title: CATL 为 50 亿美元的潜在香港上市兴趣进行评估
item.description: 全球最大的电动汽车电池制造商--当代安培瑞斯科技有限公司（Amperex Technology Co.全球最大的电动汽车电池生产商安培瑞斯科技有限公司（Amperex Technology Co.Ltd.）开始评估投资者对股票出售的兴趣，这次出售可能会获得 50 亿美元的收益，并可能成为香港多年来最大的一次上市。【原文：Contemporary Amperex Technology Co. Ltd., the world’s largest maker of batteries for electric vehicles, began gauging investor interest for a share sale that may fetch $5 billion and will probably be Hong Kong’s biggest listing in years.】

item.title: 台湾远期汇率创二十年新高，预示美元将遭受更多冲击
item.description: 一种流行的台币衍生品的深度反转表明，美元的抛售压力还有很大的空间。【原文：The deep inversion of a popular Taiwan-dollar derivative suggests selling pressure on the US currency has plenty of room to run.】

item.title: 美元贸易相关暴跌引关注，黄金维持涨势
item.description: 继周一大涨近 3% 之后，黄金走势趋于稳定，因为投资者关注美元走软，美国潜在贸易协议的前景在包括亚洲在内的货币市场引起反响。【原文：Gold steadied — following a surge of almost 3% on Monday — as investors focused on a weaker dollar, with prospects for potential US trade deals reverberating though currency markets including in Asia.】

item.title: OpenAI 达成协议，将以 30 亿美元收购初创公司 Windsurf
item.description: 据知情人士透露，OpenAI 已同意以约 30 亿美元的价格收购人工智能辅助编码工具 Windsurf（该公司前身为 Codeium），这是迄今为止 ChatGPT 制造商最大的一笔收购。【原文：OpenAI has agreed to buy Windsurf, an artificial intelligence-assisted coding tool formerly known as Codeium, for about $3 billion, according to people familiar with the matter, marking the ChatGPT maker’s largest acquisition to date.】

item.title: 微软是 OpenAI 重组计划的主要阻力
item.description: 在数月的舆论压力下，OpenAI 撤回了创建更传统的营利性公司的部分努力，但其重组计划仍未获得主要利益相关者的支持：微软公司（Microsoft Corp.【原文：After months of public pressure, OpenAI walked back part of its effort to create a more conventional for-profit company, but its restructuring plans still have not received the blessing of a major stakeholder: Microsoft Corp.】

item.title: CATL 开始评估潜在 50 亿美元香港上市的兴趣
item.description: 根据彭博新闻社看到的交易条款，全球最大的电动汽车电池制造商--当代安培瑞斯科技有限公司（Amperex Technology Co.根据彭博新闻社看到的交易条款，全球最大的电动汽车电池制造商安培雷斯科技有限公司从周二起开始评估投资者对其在香港上市的兴趣。【原文：Contemporary Amperex Technology Co. Ltd., the world’s largest maker of batteries for electric vehicles, began gauging investor interest for its Hong Kong listing from Tuesday, according to terms of the deal seen by Bloomberg News.】

item.title: ServiceNow 预计到 2026 年人工智能产品收入将达 10 亿美元
item.description: ServiceNow 公司表示，到明年，其旗舰人工智能软件产品的年合同业务量将达到 10 亿美元。【原文：ServiceNow Inc. said its flagship artificial intelligence software product will hit $1 billion in annual contracted business by next year.】

item.title: 石油维持跌势，欧佩克+供应增加影响前景
item.description: 由于中美贸易战持续发酵，欧佩克+供应增加的前景影响了石油前景，石油在大幅下跌后企稳。【原文：Oil steadied after a sharp drop with the prospect of more OPEC+ supply weighing on the outlook, as the US-China trade war drags on.】

item.title: 波动性和全球基金推动印度期权交易量增长
item.description: 随着全球投资者和市场波动卷土重来，印度的股票衍生品活动在经历了因监管机构抑制投机性押注而导致的低迷之后，正在蓄势待发。【原文：Equity derivatives activity in India is gathering steam after a slump caused by regulatory curbs on speculative bets, as global investors and market swings make a comeback.】

item.title: 穆迪认为关税是马来西亚信用评级面临的主要风险
item.description: 穆迪投资者服务公司（Moody's Investors Service）认为，关税冲击对马来西亚的主权信用评级构成了重大威胁，因为这可能会扰乱经济增长和财政整顿。【原文：Tariff shocks pose a major threat to Malaysia’s sovereign credit rating, given the potential disruption to economic growth and fiscal consolidation, according to Moody’s Investors Service.】

item.title: 麦格理首席执行官称澳大利亚经济在关税影响下仍有活力
item.description: 麦格理集团（Macquarie Group Ltd.首席执行官谢马拉-维克拉马纳亚克（Shemara Wikramanayake）表示，澳大利亚的经济看起来很有韧性，能够很好地抵御美国贸易政策带来的冲击。【原文：Macquarie Group Ltd. Chief Executive Officer Shemara Wikramanayake said Australia’s economy is looking resilient and is set up well to withstand the shocks emanating from US trade policy.】

item.title: 美元走低，亚洲货币受关注：市场综述
item.description: 交易员们将密切关注周二亚洲外汇市场的动态，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的贸易战引起的反响震撼了美元，并有可能颠覆货币市场。【原文：Traders will be keeping a close eye on Asian foreign exchange developments on Tuesday, with the reverberations of US President Donald Trump’s trade war jolting the greenback and threatening to upend currency markets.】

item.title: 新西兰国家党要求限制社交媒体使用年龄
item.description: 新西兰执政党国家党（National Party）希望限制 16 岁以下青少年使用社交媒体，这与澳大利亚引发全球科技巨头批评的举措如出一辙。【原文：New Zealand’s governing National Party wants to restrict access to social media for those aged under 16 years, mirroring a move in Australia that sparked criticism from global tech giants.】

item.title: 西北大学首席信息官警告对大学基金征收 "破坏性 "税收
item.description: 西北大学正准备对捐赠基金增税，其首席投资官称此举对美国高等教育机构具有 "破坏性"。【原文：Northwestern University is preparing for a potential tax increase on endowments, a move its chief investment officer labeled as “destructive” for higher education institutions in the US.】

item.title: 香港出售创纪录数量的货币以捍卫汇率联系汇率制
item.description: 香港当局表示，他们继续购买美元，试图捍卫外汇挂钩。【原文：Hong Kong authorities said they continued to purchase US dollars in an attempt to defend the foreign exchange peg.】

item.title: 米尔肯人群在谴责一切混乱的同时也对关税感到温暖
item.description: 斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）在华尔街全球贸易拥护者数月来最大规模的聚会上走上舞台，旨在解释唐纳德-特朗普总统为何要为全球贸易设置障碍。【原文：Scott Bessent walked on stage at the largest gathering in months of Wall Street’s champions of global trade, aiming to explain why President Donald Trump is putting up hurdles to global trade.】

item.title: 安德森支持的人工智能初创公司 11x 首席执行官下台
item.description: 人工智能初创公司 11x AI Inc. 的创始人兼首席执行官哈桑-苏卡尔（Hasan Sukkar）在 LinkedIn 上发帖称，他已经卸任。他将转任非执行董事长。【原文：Hasan Sukkar, founder and chief executive officer of the artificial intelligence startup 11x AI Inc., has stepped down, according to a LinkedIn post. He will transition to the role of non-executive chairman.】

item.title: AGL、Blackstone 争辩称信贷行业和经济前景强劲
item.description: 在米尔肯研究所全球会议上，信贷行业高管组成的小组表示，信贷市场状况良好，能够应对可能到来的任何经济波动或经济放缓。【原文：Credit markets are in good shape to handle any economic volatility or slowdown that may be coming, according to a panel of credit industry executives at the Milken Institute Global Conference, who struck a more sanguine tone than many other guests at the event.】

item.title: 页岩钻探商钻石背公司削减产量，称美国石油已经见顶
item.description: 二叠纪盆地最大的独立石油生产商钻石背能源公司（Diamondback Energy Inc.【原文：Diamondback Energy Inc., the largest independent oil producer in the Permian Basin, is trimming its crude production guidance amid sinking oil prices brought on by President Donald Trump’s trade war and looming OPEC supply increases.】

item.title: 美国联邦通信委员会主席卡尔呼吁在中国竞争中发挥频谱和人工智能的领导作用
item.description: 美国联邦通信委员会主席周一表示，特朗普政府正致力于释放更多电磁频谱，为无线通信提供动力，此举可为政府带来 800 亿美元的收入，并帮助美国更好地与中国竞争。【原文：The Trump administration is focused on freeing up more electromagnetic spectrum to power wireless communication, the chairman of the Federal Communications Commission said on Monday, a move that could generate $80 billion in government revenue and help the US better compete with China.】

item.title: CBO 主任仍认为美国国债 "X 日期 "将在夏末到来
item.description: 无党派的美国国会预算办公室负责人表示，美国政府的收入似乎与之前的预测相符，这使得财政部在夏末之前都有足够的空间来解决债务限额问题。【原文：The head of the nonpartisan Congressional Budget Office said that US government revenues appear to be tracking previous projections, giving the Treasury sufficient space probably until late summer before congressional action to address the debt limit becomes vital.】

item.title: GameStop 将其加拿大连锁店出售给玩具企业家
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，法裔加拿大企业家 Stephan Tétrault 已经收购了 GameStop 公司在加拿大的门店。【原文：French-Canadian entrepreneur Stephan Tétrault has acquired GameStop Corp.’s Canadian stores, according to person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: DoorDash 是最新一家向纽约市选举投入数百万美元的科技公司
item.description: DoorDash 公司今年将投入 500 万美元支持纽约市和新泽西州的政治候选人，成为最新一家在三州地区地方选举前披露其游说活动的科技公司。【原文：DoorDash Inc. is committing $5 million to back political candidates in New York City and state-level races in New Jersey this year, becoming the latest technology company to disclose its lobbying efforts ahead of local elections in the tristate area.】

item.title: KKR 联合创始人呼吁对关税保持冷静，并兜售欧洲机遇
item.description: KKR & Co. 的联合创始人表示，这家另类资产管理公司正在美国以外的地区寻找投资机会，包括欧洲。【原文：KKR & Co.’s co-founders said the alternative asset manager is looking outside of the US for investment opportunities, including Europe.】

item.title: Palantir 销售预测辜负华尔街厚望
item.description: Palantir Technologies Inc.周一在致股东的信中把对人工智能软件不断增长的需求形容为 "贪婪的旋风"，该公司上调了全年营收预期，并公布了超出分析师预期的季度销售额。【原文：Palantir Technologies Inc. described rising demand for artificial intelligence software as a “ravenous whirlwind” in a letter to shareholders Monday, as the company raised its full-year revenue forecast and reported quarterly sales that beat analyst estimates.】

item.title: 激进分子 Plantro 加大了对 ISC 的争夺，计划延长小型招标的期限
item.description: 一位激进投资者正在升级针对信息服务公司（Information Services Corp.【原文：An activist investor is escalating a campaign against Information Services Corp. and will extend the deadline for a mini-tender offer that seeks to buy as much as 15% of the Canadian database company.】

item.title: 高盛认为在大型科技公司发布财报后，人工智能领域存在逢低买入的机会
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs）的一组分析师表示，上月底，一些最大的人工智能科技公司发布了好于预期的业绩，这预示着在最近的低迷之后，投资者有机会拾起这些公司的股票。【原文：Better-than-expected results late last month from some of the biggest technology companies using artificial intelligence signal an opportunity for investors to pick up shares in the cohort after the recent slump, according to a group of analysts at Goldman Sachs.】

item.title: 美国商品期货交易委员会（CFTC）请求法院允许就卡尔希政治博彩案达成和解
item.description: 美国商品期货交易委员会（Commodity Futures Trading Commission）已请求法院允许其解决与卡尔希公司（Kalshi Inc.【原文：The Commodity Futures Trading Commission has asked a court for permission to settle its legal fight with Kalshi Inc. over allowing Americans to bet on the outcome of elections.】

item.title: General Atlantic 接近达成 Blackstone 支持的 Liftoff 少数股权交易
item.description: 据熟悉此事的人士透露，General Atlantic 正在就收购 Blackstone 公司支持的 Liftoff 少数股权进行深入谈判，该交易对移动应用营销平台的估值将超过 40 亿美元。【原文：General Atlantic is in advanced talks to buy a minority stake in Blackstone Inc.-backed Liftoff in a deal that would value the mobile app marketing platform at more than $4 billion, according to people familiar with the matter.】
